info.title: Customer Management API
info.description:
In this API documentation, you will find operations that you
  will call in order to manage the customers. Operations here includes the customer attributes management.

tags.name: Authentication API
tags.description: Plain and simple authentication API. Just call it providing your username and password to retrieve your access token and your profile rights within Infracommerce marketplace API. Use this token in all other API calls in Authorization header.

tags.name: Customer Management API
tags.description: This group contains a set of APIs to manage the customer register. Operations here includes: retrieve, create and update data of a customer identified by his/her identifier (customerId) or by his/her document number.

tags.name: Customer Attributes Management API
tags.description: This group contains a set of APIs to manage the customer attributes. Operations here includes: retrieve, create, update and delete customer attributes from a specific customer identified by his/her identifier (customerId) or by his/her document number.

tags.name: Customer Group Management API
tags.description: This group contains a set of APIs to manage customer groups. Using operations defined here you will be able to associate customer to a group, both individually and massively.

tags.name: Async Operations API
tags.description: In this group you will find operations that you allow you to interact with Infrashop asynchronous operaions engine. This mechanism is used every time a long running operation is fired and you need to follow its execution

tags.name: Customer Register Notification API
tags.description: In this group you will find the operation that you need to provide in order to receive the notification of the customer registers and/or updates.

tags.name: Customer External Authentication API
tags.description: In this group you will find the operations that you need to provide in order to enable the external authentication with the store's checkout process.

get.description:
Retrieves a specific customer attribute by the customer identifier and customer attribute identifier.

Required Functionalities

Vendas - Clientes - Consultar

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The customer identifier

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Customer attribute unique identifier

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

parameters.name: includeGuests
parameters.description: The option to include customers where the type is guest.

403.description: User is not authorized. Please ensure that you have access to manage customer informations.

403.description: User is not authorized. Please ensure that you have access to manage customer informations.

post.summary: Creates a new set of customer attributes
post.description:
Creates a new set of customer attribute by the customer identifier and customer attribute identifier. If the attribute already exists its value will be updated.

Required Functionalities

Vendas - Clientes - Gravar

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The customer identifier

parameters.name: overrideAll
parameters.description: If this is set to true, all attributes will be removed and the new ones will be set for the given customer. If this is set to false, existing attributes will be updated, new ones will be created and pre-existing ones that are not in input array will remain untouched.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

parameters.name: includeGuests
parameters.description: The option to include customers where the type is guest.

200.description: The list of customer attributes created and/or updated.

403.description: User is not authorized. Please ensure that you have access to manage customer informations.

post.description:
Updates massively customer attributes. Customer is identified by the ID.

Required Functionalities

Vendas - Clientes - Gravar

parameters.name: overrideAll
parameters.description: If this is set to true, all attributes will be removed and the new ones will be set for the given customer. If this is set to false, existing attributes will be updated, new ones will be created and pre-existing ones that are not in input array will remain untouched.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

parameters.name: includeGuests
parameters.description: The option to include customers where the type is guest.

202.description: Async process information. Please use async API in order to follow its execution. During process execution you can get information from async API's "result" attribute - this will be a map containing all customer IDs that failed and the reason it failed.

403.description: User is not authorized. Please ensure that you have access to manage customer informations.

post.description:
Receives the customer register notification after the customer creates a new account or updates an existing account in the store.
This API must be provided by the partner that wants to be notified of these events.

post.description:
Creates a new customer.

Required Functionalities

Gesto de Vendas - Gesto de Cliente - Gravar

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Customer data. This customer must not have the ID fields filled.

parameters.name: preRegister
parameters.description: This parameter defines if this API will be used to pre register the customer. The customer pre register has a mininum set of validation and required attributes. When a customer is created using this parameter its type became INCOMPLETE and will not be able to place orders until its data is update.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

200.description: Updated information of the customer. In this response you can get the recently created customer identifier.

403.description: User is not authorized. Please ensure that you have access to manage customer informations.

409.description: Customer already exists. To update the user information use the PUT API.

get.summary: Retrieve the skusIds bought by customer.
get.description:
Retrieve the skuIds that customer bought in his/her last orders. The quantity of skus that will be retrieved is limited by the query parameter "quantity". The list returned is ordered by the purchase date where skus from most recent purchase comes first.

Required Functionalities

Cliente Logado
Vendas - Clientes - Consultar

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The customer identifier

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: The quantity of skuIds that will be retrieved. By default the last fifty skus will be returned and the maximum value is 200.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

200.description: The skuIds bought skusId's by the Customer.

403.description: User is not authorized. Please ensure that you have access to manage customer informations.

post.description: Receives the customer identifier and password and if it is successfully authenticated return its register data.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
Authentication data that the partner need to authenticate the user.
OBS: the customer password can be crypted according to the algorithm agreed between Infrashop and the partner.

CustomerAttributesByDocumentArray.description: Array used to set massively customer attributes. Customer is identified by document number.

CustomerAttributesByDocument.description: Object used to set massively customer attributes

CustomerAttributesByIdArray.description: Array used to set massively customer attributes. Customer is identified by ID.

CustomerAttributesById.description: Object used to set massively customer attributes

CustomerGroupByDocumentArray.description: Array used to set massively customer groups. Customer is identified by document number.

CustomerGroupByDocument.description: Object used to set massively customer groups

CustomerGroupByIdArray.description: Array used to set massively customer groups. Customer is identified by ID.

CustomerGroupById.description: Object used to set massively customer groups

id.description: Customer group unique identifier. This is a three letter mnemonic.

b2bOnly.description: If this is true, this customer group should be used only in B2B operations

ExternalAuthenticationData.description: The data used to authenticate the user.

login.description: Customer identifier. This can be the customer e-mail or the document number, depending on the store's configuration.

password.description: Customer password. The customer password can be crypted according to the algorithm agreed between Infrashop and the partner.

CustomerPagination.description: Standard pagination envelope response. Customers entries will be available in "items".

links.description:
Collection of page links. You will find up to 5 links:
  • self - link to this same page
  • first - link to the first page
  • last - link to the last page
  • next - link to the next page. This will be only presented when there is a next page
  • previous - link to the previous page. This will be only presented when there is a previous page
